data.message: HI facebook, something happen to my facebook and now I can't see the names of people who like things, I only see numbers, I check it with another facebook and it oes well, the problam is in mine, please tell me what to do or fix it I freaks out, I will be so much thankful if you help me to fix it, heres is a screenshot

replies.message: Hi, Romy! Thanks for bringing this to our attention. Can you please help us track this issue and submit the problem to support through our Help Center? https://www.facebook.com/help/www/181495968648557/ -Kelsey
I already reported there, is there any solution to this bug?
